condition.narrative: Finance Agreement :EUCL Financial Recovery Plan | Description:The Recipient has developed and obtained Cabinet approval of theSector Financial Recovery Plan. | Due Date :11-Mar-2016

Finance Agreement :EUCL Operating Revenue | Description :The Recipient shall ensure that the EUCL’s Operating Revenue shall reflectthe principles of Cost Recovery and be sufficient to cover Operating Expenses and Debt Service. | Frequency :Yearly

Finance Agreement :Open and maintain customer contribution account | Description :Not later than 30th of the month, EUCL to depositinto the customer designated account the customer contribution collected the preceding month. | Frequency :Yearly
Finance Agreement :Submission of annual financial audits | Description :Annual financial audits submitted within six months afterthe end of each financial year. | Frequency :Yearly

title.narrative: Switching stations rehabilitated and added to the SCADA/EMS in Kigali distribution system
Distribution lines constructed under the project
Distribution lines constructed or rehabilitated under the project
People provided with access to electricity by hhold connections-Grid
People provided with access to electricity by household connections
Preparation of quarterly financial reports by the 5th day of the end of each quarter
Community electricity connections constructed under the project
Development of a corporate strategic plan (including key KPIs and a dash board)
Utility publishes annual report on citizen engagement
Reduced average receivables debtors age for postpaid customers
Reduction in energy not served in Kigali City 15KV distribution network (total annual Gigawatt-hour (GWh))
Reduced average outage duration in 15 KV system of Kigali distribution network
